contents.text: Thank you for calling ClearBrain in San Francisco, where AI powers your growth marketing solutions.
For help with your current AI-driven marketing campaigns, press 1.
To review campaign performance and analytics, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a campaign analytics specialist.

navigationGoals: I need a quick review of my current AI campaign’s performance metrics.
I’d like a detailed performance review of my current AI-driven marketing campaigns.
Review KPI dashboards and ROI metrics for my current AI-driven marketing campaign
I need help understanding how well my current AI-powered ads are performing.
I need to review the ROI and engagement metrics for my current AI-driven marketing campaign.

contents.text: To troubleshoot retargeting or delivery issues, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to a retargeting support agent.

navigationGoals: I’m experiencing delivery issues with my retargeting ads and need troubleshooting help.
I’m not seeing my retargeting ads run properly and need help troubleshooting delivery issues.
Diagnose low dynamic retargeting impressions and delivery errors in my AI campaign
My marketing ads aren’t reaching the right audience; I need assistance fixing my retargeting.
I’m having trouble with my retargeting ads not reaching my target audience and need technical support.

contents.text: To learn about our predictive ads, lookalike audiences, and email retargeting services, press 2.
To schedule a live demo of our AI predictive ads platform, press 1.
Please hold while we set up your predictive ads demo.

navigationGoals: I’d like to schedule a live demo of your AI predictive ads platform.
I want to schedule a live demo of your AI predictive ads platform.
Schedule a live demo of the AI predictive ads platform focusing on predictive bidding features
I’d like to schedule a live demonstration of the AI predictive ads platform.
I want to schedule a live demonstration of your predictive advertising platform.

contents.text: To speak with a consultant about lookalike audiences and email strategies, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to a growth marketing consultant.

navigationGoals: I want to speak with a consultant about building lookalike audiences and email retargeting strategies.
I need to speak with a consultant about building lookalike audiences and email retargeting strategies.
Consult on building optimized lookalike audience segments and automated email retargeting workflows
I want to speak with a consultant about finding lookalike customers and planning my email campaigns.
I’d like to discuss best practices for building lookalike audiences and email retargeting strategies.
